parameters.name: EnsRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the Edge Node Service (ENS) node.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerName
parameters.description:
The name of the ELB instance. The name must be 1 to 80 characters in length. If you leave this parameter empty, the system randomly allocates a name as the value of this parameter.

>  The value cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerSpec
parameters.description: The specification of the ELB instance.

parameters.name: NetworkId
parameters.description: The network ID of the created ELB instance.

parameters.name: PayType
parameters.description: The billing method of the instance. Valid value: PostPaid. PostPaid specifies the pay-as-you-go billing method.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch to which the internal-facing ELB instance belongs.
